mapper.select: SELECT care_info_id AS careInfoId, CONCAT(care_sorting, '-', care_info_content) AS careSorting FROM care_info WHERE animal_category_id = #{animalCategoryId} AND care_sorting != '정기검진';

SELECT a.animal_id AS animalId, ci.care_info_id AS careInfoId, ci.animal_category_id AS animalCategoryId, ci.care_sorting AS careSorting, ci.care_info_content AS careInfoContent, ci.care_time careTime, DATE(ad.adopt_date) AS `입양일`, DATE_ADD(date(ad.adopt_date), INTERVAL 52 week) AS `정기검진`, DATE_ADD(date(ad.adopt_date), INTERVAL ci.care_time week) AS `careDate` FROM animal AS a, care_info AS ci, adopt AS ad, adopt_apply AS aa
a.animal_category_id = ci.animal_category_id AND ad.adopt_apply_id = aa.adopt_apply_id AND aa.animal_id = a.animal_id AND a.shelter_id = #{shelterId} AND a.animal_id = #{animalId} AND ci.care_info_id = #{careInfoId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO care_plan( animal_id, member_id, staff_id, care_info_id, care_date, create_date ) VALUE( #{animalId}, #{memberId}, #{staffId}, #{careInfoId}, #{careDate}, NOW() )
